name: Cannondale 2020 Canvas Neo 2 E-Bicycle - Unisex
description: Cruise in style and comfort. This beautiful e-bike is loaded for city cruising. Powered by a Bosch drive unit, you get 5 levels of pedal assist to power up any hill and around every traffic jam. For riders who see urban cycling as a lifestyle not a sport, this marvellous machine is a piece of 2-wheeled tech that’s functional and still looks fabulous.Smartform C2 alloy frame construction with relaxed geometry for upright pedalling.Powered by Bosch Active Line Plus with a Bosch Purion display.Removable Bosch PowerTube 400 battery and Bosch 2a charger.Support levels: ECO (40%), TOUR (100%), SPORT (180%) and TURBO (270%).To keep your battery performing at its best, follow the manufacturer’s guidelines regarding storage and charging conditions (e-Bike batteries can be very sensitive to cold temperatures).Includes Tubus Wingee full wrap fenders and a pre-mounted rack (8kg capacity).Equipped with Herman H Black MR4 front light, Supernova E3 rear light, and Cannondale wheel sensor.1x9 drive train pairs a 38T chainring and a 11-56T cassette.Hydraulic disc brakes.Tubeless ready tires.Wheel sensor pairs with your phone via the free Cannondale app and uses Garmin™ technology to record your rides, provide your: time, speed, distance, calories, etc. and it even tells you about your carbon offset. The app also provides reminders for needed services, tracks service history and more.Wheel sensor works with ANT+® or Bluetooth® and uses an easily replaceable 2032 battery that lasts more than a year.Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for two years after purchase.
